dsOverview.title: Nimbus 7 Coastal Zone Color Scanner Pigment Concentration

summary.p: Ocean surface color is used to estimate surface pigment concentration (chlorophyll). Based on the Nimbus 7 satellite data for 1978-1986, taken from " Monthly Mean Distributions of Satellite-Derived Sea Surface Temperature and Pigment Concentration" Product: USA_NASA_JPL_PODAAC_A001-A005, Version 1.

creator.name: UCAR/NCAR/CISL/DSS > Data Support Section, Computational and Information Systems Laboratory, National Center for Atmospheric Research, University Corporation for Atmospheric Research

contributor.name: NASA/JPL/PODAAC > Physical Oceanography Distributed Active Archive Center, Jet Propulsion Laboratory, NASA

dsOverview.variable: EARTH SCIENCE > Oceans > Ocean Chemistry > Chlorophyll
